name: Meow Meow Madness
description:
Meow Meow Madness is a two-player hotseat game made for the Kentucky Fried Pixels Jam.

As the Human you need to hide the cat food somewhere in the apartment so that the Cat player can't find it.  To trick the cat player, you are given a few different items to hide.

As the Cat , you need to find the cat food, without making a mess, and while avoiding the traps set by the Human player.

Credits:
Game Design and programming by: Aaron Goodwine, Drew Walker, Glenn Essex
Art by Zachary Hunt
Music by Aaron Goodwine
Sound Design by Glenn Essex
